wikipedia_page.main: Jane Davy or Jane Kerr or Jane Apreece (5 February 1780 – 8 May 1855) was an heiress and socialite who, after having lost a rich husband, married Sir Humphry Davy.

response: **Shuckburgh Ashby Apreece (1773–1807) married the future Lady Jane DavySophie Forgan, 'Davy , Jane, Lady Davy (1780–1855)’, Oxford Dictionary of National Biography, Oxford University Press, 2004; online edn, May 2008 accessed 17 Dec 2014
